Excellent pizza! Fast service and we love this place!

Great pizza. On a Sunday where I really did not want to wait in the store while my pizza was made due to covid, or wait outside in the cold. I decided to call and place order for pick up. I called for 20 minutes no answer. So I went to the store and placed my order. I dialed the same number. Guy never looked at the phone while it rang. I’m actually calling now while writing  this review and he just walked away in to the back. I’m the only customer in here.
The images you see are NOT ALTERED. The slices are that HUGE. This place has been here for years. Add toppings to your slice for an additional treat.
BIG pizza and is delicious!!

ABSOLUTELY ONE OF MY FAVORITE PLACES TO GO FOR A SLICE!!! 5/5 STARS FROM ME !
This is the best pizza in my opinion in the bronx. This is the pizzeria that Jennifer Lopez when she is in town eats. It's small but big in flavor.

Big slices,  great flavor,  not crazy expensive. There's a reason this place has been there for years. One slice is hard to finish by yourself unless you're super hungry. The guys that work there are such nice people,  great place to stop in for a slice,  just bring your appetite 😁
Good price huge slice
My favorite pizza spot since I was 10 years old! My kids love this pizza now too!  This place never gets old! Relationship 34 years and still going strong! 😋🍕
Some of the best pizza in the Bronx!!

I sent my friends to this place with my warmest recommendations. I go their often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The the cooking is tasty and the stuff is efficient and cooperative. always when we eat in this place we have a gorgeous evening.  highly recommended.

Huge slices.  Pizza has a great taste, good quality mozzarella and a fresh sauce.  Dough is freshly made.  Best pizza in neighborhood
Best pizza in the Bronx

Super great place. I’m a pizza junkie, and this place definitely fills my cravings. Huge pizza slices for a pretty good price. Overall, it’s the same price as a specialty slice in Manhattan and you get a pizza slice that is 2-3 times as large. Still great quality. They don’t sacrifice quality for quantity.
Big slices at great prices
I pick up my kids, I always buy 2 house pies and bring them back to CT to tie me over until the next weekend! 198/10 Recommend!!!

Good pizza straight from the heart of Bronx. Slices are huge and good ($3.50 for a huge slice not bad at all). Recommended.

A slice of the bronx. Giant slice of pizza cooked to perfection. Add your favorite topping. Nothing fancy,  but they cook up a superb pie. Eat in or take out. 🏆👍

This place serves gaint slices of pizza. The pizza is really good. When ever friends or family come to visit from out of town I always take them here to get a slice that they will always remember. Fast friendly service,fair prices. If you are in the Area and want a really big great tasting pizza I definitely recommend you stop in and see for yourself.

Nice, Big Old Pizza Starting At 3 Dollars For A Huge Plain Slice. As A Local, The Best Pizza In The Bronx. Definitely A Must Have. Convenient Location Just A Couple Blocks From The 6 Train On Castle Hill And Right In Front Of The Q44 Bus Stop.

Always remember, with any business, the key to success is just like real estate: location, location, location! Cross Bronx Pizzeria couldn't be any more convenient to patrons. Right next to a public school, church, 2 bus stops, an off-ramp for the Cross Bronx Expressway, I could go on and on! Foot traffic is practically a daily ritual. Just a few blocks south of the IRT #6 train, s neighborhood staple for decades. And for $3.50, you op pretty much get 2 slices for the price of one! And when you head in, look towards the back for a framed photo of a certain Jenny from the block stopping by 😉
